techniques.description: Start slow, gradually increase tempo. Use silence and pauses strategically
Plant false leads and red herrings through background action

characterNotes.performanceNotes: Show subtle signs of awareness and anxiety. Small reactions to sounds/movements
characterNotes.dialogue: Keep dialogue minimal. Use breathing and small vocalizations

blockingNotes: Use confined spaces and blocked escape routes to create claustrophobia
notes: Build tension through anticipation rather than action. Less is more
